actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation with amendment, S. Rept. 95-198.
Placed on Calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.R. 4049 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations for the U.S. Railway Association.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation with amendment, S. Rept. 95-198) Amends the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations not to exceed $15,000,000 for the United States Railway Association in order to meet its administrative expenses for fiscal year 1978. Amends the Interstate Commerce Act to authorize appropriations not to exceed $2,000,000 for the Office of Rail Public Counsel.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations for the U.S. Railway Association.
